short_description: xinmeige is a building material manufacturer based in loudi, china.
generated_description: xinmeige, legally known as hunan xinmei gelu section steel co. ltd., is a company based in loudi, hunan. it specializes in the production and distribution of various decorative materials, including tiles, stones, glass, aluminum, and wooden products. the company offers a wide range of products such as corner lines, decorative panels, aluminum strips, and skirting boards. xinmeige has been recognized for its innovative capabilities, being awarded as a national high-tech enterprise and an excellent innovative enterprise. it has also been named a hunan provincial famous trademark and a key listed company in the province. the company holds over 200 patents, including发明专利, 实用新型专利, and 外观设计专利.
